author: mybrandt
title: SCAMADA SOS
description:
Scams are everywhere and we want to help those who get trapped and fall into a scam.
A simple solution to a big problem.

author: felixweber
title: Catalyst Swarm Operations
description: Catalyst Swarm needs resources to reward crucial and important community engagement besides sessions and events.

author: felixweber
title: Cardano Ambassadors Catalyst Guild
description: Lacking communication, coordination & collaboration between the Cardano Foundation and the Catalyst Community/Ecosystem

author: tjitse
title: NFTs for a better world
description: NFT technology enables new ways to empower people to contribute to a better world. But most projects focus solely on visual development

author: jorge.ici
title: Cardano & Mental Health
description: Depression is a public health problem. Lost productivity, because of anxiety and depression, costs the global economy US$ 1 trillion yearly.

author: shirogat
title: Train 100 Math teachers in Africa
description: Math teachers do not teach Math computationally

author: fhilip.k
title: ADA Holder Engagement Survey - AIM
description: Catalyst requires a broad, global base of engaged voters for the decentralized governance experiment to succeed.

title: NANO Frames - Digital CNFT Frames
description: CNFT holders are looking for a way to display and interact with their NFTs on physical displays with Cardano wallet integration.

author: vcoincheck
title: Project Evaluation Website
description: A lot of investors have lost money because of investing in scam projects and lack of objective information to invest their money effectively

author: rodes
title: ADA 4 Science
description: Science corruption and fundings have forced our public policies & laws to a high level of biased and tailored policies. it needs to change.

author: matthiasksieber
title: Win-Win Web Dev Internship Program
description: There are almost no internship programs for university students to get involved with Cardano while working with Web Development.

author: matthiasksieber
title: Loxe Inc. Plutus Internship Program
description: There are almost no internship programs for university students to get involved with Cardano, learn Haskell and Plutus.

author: john.jackson
title: Formulating a Community Defense
description: The industry needs capacity for preventing and mitigating theft and fraud. But, it lacks a coordinated strategy. Fraud threatens adoption.

author: calixtorontocalix
title: Feature Film 👉Onboarding Hollywood
description: How do we onboard mainstream entertainment studios into Cardano & become the best in class ecosystem for high value entertainment projects?

author: jonpaul
title: 3D printer hardware interface
description: There is not enough economic opportunity with Cardano in the physical world

author: swhitenstall
title: Ekphrasis Gitbook
description: Documentation of philosophical debate and discussion around Cardano requires support to be sustainable.

author: arturictus
title: NFTree protocol
description: Climate breakdown is increasing the severity of weather conditions as floods, storms, unprecedented heatwaves, deadly air pollution.

author: huths0lo
title: Real world products
description: There isnt allot of tangible items that can bring more attention to Cardano.

author: evaginger
title: Researching CNFTs at Uni of Oxford
description: Cardano is research-based but the immense impact blockchain technology will bring to our society is only marginally reflected in humanities.

author: qhaleesi
title: SAVINGS CULTURE AMONG THE UNBANKED
description: The unbanked have no access to friendly savings systems that encourage micro saving of $0.5-$10 per week/month regularly.

author: milan
title: Cardano Cube - Ecosystem Overview
description: Cardano information is scattered all over the web, making it hard to gain knowledge fast and easy.

author: francek
title: Philanthropy & positive change
description: People sometimes need help (material, emotional, financial...), but they either don't know where to ask or are too embarrassed about it.

author: chrisr
title: WILD NFT
description: NFTs supporting natural environment are underdeveloped. Huge opportunity exists for NFTs that help protect natural environments & animals.

author: jenniferrlewis614
title: ADA Token to Combat Homelessness
description: Americans should have rental assistance. However, with only 11% of government funds distributed, 750,000 families now face eviction.

author: henokp50
title: Cryptocurrency Exchange for Africa
description: Lack of a cryptocurrency exchange that supports trading in native fiat currency in Ethiopia, Eritrea, Ghana, Zimbabwe, Djibouti, Rwanda.

author: glaxas
title: Catalyst Circle Treasury Management
description: Catalyst Circle needs to pay operating costs and Circle members for duties performed. Transactions need to be documented and managed.

author: jtrube
title: Candy Pop-Up Campaign
description: There is a large untapped resource of individuals who are casually aware of Cardano, but do not actively participate in the community.

author: dcspark
title: Milkomeda ADA Audit
description: Milkomeda consists of multiple novel un-audited concepts introduced to Cardano written in Rust including multiple open source components.

author: game.changer.wallet
title: GameChanger: Ledger HW support
description: Our feature rich, Cardano unleasher wallet is not yet compatible with Ledger or Trezor HW wallets. This affects user onboarding and trust.

author: game.changer.wallet
title: GameChanger: Most required features
description: GameChanger users requested lots of features that have been addressed, but we're delayed on other key features we want to prioritize.

author: raz
title: SustainableADA Goals Token Research
description: There isn't a user friendly, transparent way to directly invest towards Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) you're passionate about.

author: ismunoz.fytoboros
title: Cardano enabled sustainable food
description: Meat products contribute to ~15% of human carbon footprint. Plant-based meat products account for only <3% of meat sales.

author: despas.damien
title: ADAGLASS Data Intelligence Platform
description: There isn't a platform for Cardano's stakeholders to monitor and visualise the performance, growth and opportunities of the ecosystem

author: timetowakeup2022
title: SOLID - IDO (Solidarity platform)
description:
Financial dynamic doesn't bring true value to our human real needs & values.
Good actions = donations
Donations= debt
war = profit

author: joey.chessher
title: Technical Resource Pool
description: There is no Technical Resource Pool where Non-Programmers can access the Programming Talent needed for their proposals to be successful.

author: dionyziz
title: Research DAO
description: Research in the field of blockchain science often receives funding in an opaque manner, and foundational research remains unfunded.

author: passthenachos
title: Content Synchronization using Audio
description: Media is often reused in many small pieces. Content rights holders need a way to validate consumption of their media in distributed networks

author: sikaffy27
title: blockchain based Dating App
description: Online dating has become the norm, but centralized dating apps fail at helping people find suitable romantic partners.

author: benjamin.xo
title: Art at the Edge of The Universe
description: Most NFT projects do not utilise the full creative potential of smart contracts to create new types of digital artworks.

author: ccadminteam
title: CC Admin Team Scope Expansion
description: Without ongoing funding, the CC Admin Team cannot fulfill its role in supporting the functions and operations of the Catalyst Circle.

author: ccadminteam
title: CCv3: Sustaining the Circle
description: The Catalyst Circle fulfills a valuable community role but it cannot be sustained on a volunteer basis

author: heinz.gassner
title: DLT Classification offside the hype
description: The Blockchain space is currently full of hype and toxic lobbying. Glancing at market capitalization and buzzwords are dominating the scene

author: heinz.gassner
title: DLT Governance Classification
description: The Blockchain space is currently full of hype and toxic lobbying. Glancing at market capitalization and buzzwords are dominating the scene

author: heinz.gassner
title: Industry Presentation Kit
description: Only a minority of people in industry has an idea about the impact of Blockchain on their business-future. YouTube channels don't do the job

author: heinz.gassner
title: Onboard Manufacturing Industry !
description: Until recently, industrial innovation managers classified DLT/Blockchain technology as a pre-mature hype. Now this is rapidly changing

author: adilabd
title: Incrypture- Structured-FI Education
description: Incryptures Smart Structure protocol won't be viable without building a community of users.

author: lennext
title: Create Teaming Agreement Templates
description: Catalyst funds teams of strangers working together as unincorporated entities without formal agreements defining rights or liabilities.

author: larde.victor
title: Ubuntu Contributionism
description: Imagine a perfect world full of harmony and abundance. The kind of world most of us have dreamed of all our lives.

author: jeffghome2020
title: University/College Outreach
description: We need to reach out to university and college students and graduates to raise awareness of Cardano and the opportunities that exist.

author: nftdao
title: Near Field Query tap authentication
description:
Current methods for anticounterfeiting are ineffective and have loopholes;
Blockchain needs effortless tap integration to enhance adoption.

author: newmindflow
title: Showcase Film Industry Use-Case
description: The film industry could be a very powerful ally in the mainstream adoption of blockchain tech. How do we get decision-makers interested?

author: daynakovacic
title: Cardano Film Studios
description: There is a lack of global awareness about Distributed Ledger Technology/Blockchains. It is perceived as only for trading or crime.

author: chadle
title: Cardano NFT Search Engine
description: There are no applications that can search tokens based on metadata. All applications currently search on policy ID and token name.

author: andreas.kirchner
title: Staking for Children
description:
We want families to stake their money.
Families lose in average 1000€ a year with low-interest bank accounts.
How can we support them?

author: pmcl77
title: NFT Vetted Calendar
description: In the flood of new NFT projects, it's time consuming and hard to decide which NFT projects are solid and worth investing in.

author: pmcl77
title: NFT Floor-Update
description: NFT collectors spend hours everyday on multiple marketplaces checking the (floor) value of NFTs they own or they want to trade/sell/buy.

author: miriam
title: RAZ Finance: Decentralized Impact
description: A new, more conscious, generation of investors expects genuine environmental, social & governance outcomes. Self-reported data isn't enough.

author: nzola8
title: Cardano/Lokole Network integration
description: Nearly about 40% of the world population is not connected to internet. Very difficult for this population to access Cardano system.

author: allisonfromm
title: Catalyst Circle Mentorship
description: Catalyst Circle (CC) members serve for short periods of time. Mentorship from the previous circle is needed to ensure smooth transitions.

author: dr.christian.unger
title: The Cardano Carbon Footprint
description: We want to make Cardano carbon neutral and climate positive. If we know Cardano's carbon footprint, we can make the shift to positive.

author: amolagg
title: AI in geological analysis
description: Current Geological Analysis techniques are invasive in nature and very expension.

author: lennon.m
title: Africans acquiring ADA through USSD
description: Over 50% of Africans still use non-smart phones. However, most crypto exchanges in Africa are only accessible through smart devices.

author: udais
title: Carbon Footprint Ledger
description: How can we mitigate our Carbon footprint using ADA and avoid greenwashing?

author: zoeselina
title: Science Hyperspace on Cardano
description: Science always had problems with organisation, references, access and accessibility. There is no safe space to store knowledge of humankind.

author: gufmar
title: Native Tokenomics Template
description: Industry and business projects often do not understand how Cardano Blockchain features and functions can be used efficiently

author: fireflyshire
title: Cardano Eco-Village of the Future
description: There aren't enough places to experience the future of crypto & NFTs in everyday life, or that highlight Cardano as the green blockchain.

author: tylercase
title: Cardano Caravan for Advisors
description: Building Cardano's brand recognition requires marketing and education to all stakeholders in the physical and digital worlds.

author: dominik.tilman
title: Outreach Campaign
description: Low awareness about Project Catalyst outside of our community and about the different ways to participate in the funding process.
